content: i am a huge science fiction fan and i watch a lot of star trek while i crochet in the starting credits of star trek the next generation there is a passing shot of saturn it is such a majestic beautiful planet with its ombré rings > this pattern is available for > free 1 on my blog for an ad-free > version you can buy the pdf this pattern for is also available for free 2 on the original site it was published it was first published in knotions magazine **pattern information** ----------------------- **yarn** -------- king cole splash double knitting 5g in sweet dreams **hook** -------- 3 mm **other supplies** ------------------ fibrefill toy stuffing sewing needle to sew in ends scissors stitch marker start using a stitch maker on round 2 **newsletter** -------------- sign up to my email list 3 for latest news pattern releases and testing **questions** ------------- if you have any questions please email me on hello@ruthhaydock com **use of this pattern** ----------------------- pattern & images © ruth haydock - all rights reserved all content in this pdf pattern are the copyright and design right of ruth haydock you are not permitted to sell the written instructions or images in any way amended or as they are you are not permitted to alter this design and sell the altered pattern you may only print this pattern out for personal use you are allowed to sell completed items that you have made using this pattern but you must credit me as the designer of the pattern ruth haydock and provide a link to my website ruthhaydock com 5 **pattern queries and help** ---------------------- if you need help or have a question about any of my patterns please email me on hello@ruthhaydock com 1 https //ruthhaydock com/pocket-planet-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //knotions com/my-little-pocket-planet-keyring/ 3 https //ruthhaydock com/newsletter/ 5 https //ruthhaydock com/
